title: Boutique Art-Deco Stay in the Heart of Hunter Valley
description: Calling all wine lovers! Treat yourself and someone special to a stay at Vine Valley Inn, a quirky boutique property set amid the Hunter Valley wine region in New South Wales. Spend your days touring cellar doors, breweries and distilleries, before returning to the comfort of this cosy art-deco-style property located in the heart of Cessnock. Includes daily continental breakfast, a bottle of local wine on arrival and a lazy late 12 midday checkout.
